DOC.brief_summary: The present project multicenter phase II trail aim compare two postgrafting immunosuppressive regimen propose study best suit prevent graft-versus-host disease ( GVDH ) . The immunosuppressive regimen consist : Tacrolimus plus Mycophenolate Mofetil Tacrolimus plus Sirolimus . Before graft patient undergo reduced-intensity conditioning Fludarabine/total body irradiation ( TBI ) Fludarabine/Busulfan/anti-thymoglobuline . Following interim analysis October 2014 , protocol amend allow inclusion Flu-TBI conditioning . The hypothesis Tacrolimus plus Sirolimus regimen associate well progression-free survival due low incidence relapse/progression .
